author: Special Correspondent
text:
Defending Vijay Mallya, Janata Dal (secular) chief H.D. Deve Gowda on Saturday said: “He [Mallya] is born in Karnataka, not in London. It is not a sin to be born in Karnataka

His father Vittal Mallya was a big businessman and was close to many Congress leaders in Karnataka, Mr. Gowda told the media.

Mr. Mallya was elected to the Rajya Sabha in 2002 from Karnataka with the support of the Congress and the JD(S). Again in 2010 he entered the Upper House with the backing of the BJP and the JD (S). When asked, whether he repents for supporting him, Mr. Gowda said “no”, adding that, ups and downs in the business was natural thing, there was nothing unusual about that.
title: Deve Gowda backs him
